issues.description: The problem statement requires the unmodified submission to print the exact text "Hello ASM!" (problem_statement.md line 16), but the template's data string is "Hello World!" (template_repository/helloWorld.asm line 3). The solution repository also does not demonstrate the required output (it contains a commented example PRINT_STRING "Hallo" and no active data/string definition). This mismatch will cause students who submit the provided template unchanged to fail the stated requirement and will confuse them about the expected output.
issues.suggested_fix: Make the expected output and the repository contents consistent. Either change the problem statement to require "Hello World!" or (preferably) update template_repository/helloWorld.asm so the data string is hello db "Hello ASM!", 10, 0. Also update the solution repository (or its comments) to demonstrate the same output text so students can verify the intended result. Ensure the instruction about submitting the task unchanged matches the actual template content.
